context: Season nine premiered on <a3_0>January 12, <a0_0>2010<a3_0/><a0_0/>. The upheaval at the judging panel continued. <a1_0><a5_0>Ellen DeGeneres<a5_0/><a1_0/> joined as a judge to replace <a4_0>Paula Abdul<a4_0/> at the start of <a2_0><a6_0>Hollywood Week<a6_0/><a2_0/>.
